justification: I selected ETFs with strong bullish momentum indicators, focusing on those with RSI above 70 indicating potential overbought conditions but sustained strength, and all MACD and EMA values showing no divergence or bearish signals. Specifically, QQQ.O, VONG.O, VUG.P, SPYG.P, and XLY.P have RSI values exceeding 90, suggesting robust upward momentum that may continue in the short term, while other factors like EMA equality and zero MACD indicate stable trends without signs of reversal.

Selected ETFs exhibit strong bullish momentum with MACD histogram positive and expanding, RSI above 70 indicating strong upward trends, and price above EMAs. For example, SPYG.P has the highest RSI at 88.396 with positive MACD histogram, VONG.O and VUG.P show high RSI and positive momentum, while XLV.P and PPH.O combine high RSI with robust MACD signals, suggesting continued short-term gains.

Selected ETFs exhibit strong bullish momentum with MACD line above zero and positive MACD histogram, combined with RSI above 60 indicating strong upward trends and potential for continued gains over the next month.

Selected ETFs exhibit strong bullish momentum with positive and rising MACD histograms, RSI above 50 indicating sustained strength, and price above key EMAs. For example, IJK.P and IJS.P show high MACD histograms and solid RSI, while QQQ.O and VONG.O have strong trends despite high RSI, suggesting continued upside potential.

Selected ETFs exhibit strong bullish technical signals: all have price above EMA, positive and rising MACD histogram indicating momentum, and RSI in neutral to strong regions (above 50) without extreme overbought levels, supporting continued upward potential over the next month.

Selected ETFs exhibit strong bullish momentum with positive MACD histograms and RSI above 50, indicating upward trends. IBB.O and PPH.O show high RSI and positive MACD histograms, suggesting strong momentum; XLV.P has a positive MACD histogram and high RSI, supporting continued gains; XLF.P and XRT.P display positive MACD histograms with neutral to strong RSI, indicating potential breakout opportunities.

Selected ETFs exhibit strong bullish momentum with MACD histogram positive and expanding, RSI above 50 indicating strength, and price above EMAs. QQQ.O and XLK.P show high MACD histogram values and RSI in bullish zones, while XLY.P and SPY.P have solid trends and momentum. XRT.P is included for its high MACD histogram and potential rebound from neutral RSI.
